title: Rellik
description: Indecisive. Germophobic. Haphephobic. Haemophobic. Potential Spinster. Self-declared Second-Rate. Shaved Head. Teacher.My name is Rellik. I have a secret. Her name is Ivy.And I want to kill her. Badly***Rellik Tapat vows to rot gracefully as a spinster unless Ivy is dead. But then she meets Graig, a British entrepreneur who's willing to do everything just to get her hesitant yes:Getting all her family's permissions to court her in a month. Waiting for two years to get married.Spending a maximum of 20 quid on weekly dates. And the not so biggie condition, A Marriage Without Sexâ€¦Forever.Is love a mistake or a destiny?
author: Lucita Jr
